about_the_game: This is an adventure game, players through continuous exploration and clear maps  to access  resources, then strengthen themselves, defeat the final dragon, save the continent of spirit stone. About fighting style, we have different characters skills for different role, players through the continuous elimination of skill blocks to control the role  release  skills, and according to the different attributes of pets to activate the spirit stone to help pass the map.The continent of  spirit stone have five level worlds,The game's biggest feature is players can still hang up in the background after offline, when they on line,they can gain experience, money and equipment, to cultivate different pets, strengthen their own equipment!
